borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The application has failed to demonstrate how it will address the impact on neighbouring amenities and the rest of the primary mixed use parade/terrace as a whole, resulting levels of noise and odours and general disturbance to the local residents arising out of the proposed development. The proposed development would therefore be contrary to: <br>• The National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (MHCLG, February 2019); <br>• Policies 7.1 and 7.15 of the London Plan: Spatial Development Strategy for Greater London (GLA, consolidated with alterations since 2011, published March 2016); <br>• CE1, CP3 of the Core Strategy; <br>• Policies BC8, BP8, BP10 of Borough wide Development Plan Document<br>• SP4, DM11, DM25, DM16 of the Barking and Dagenham Draft Local&nbsp; Plan November 2019</p><div><br></div>

<p>The application has failed to demonstrate detailed disposal measures in accordance with Local Authority requirements. The proposed development's failure to provide detailed practical refuse and recycling disposal management has the potential to result in proliferation of waste outside the property detrimental to the visual amenity of the surroundings and with potential adverse impacts on health and wellbeing due to the generation of odour and attracting of pests. The proposed development would therefore be contrary to: </p><p>•<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>The National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);&nbsp;</p><p>•<span style="white-space:pre">	</span>Policies 5.3 of The London Plan: Spatial Development Strategy for Greater London (GLA, consolidated with alterations since 2011, published March 2016);&nbsp;</p><p>•<span style="white-space:pre">	</span>Policies SI7 and SI8 of the Draft London Plan - intend to publish version Dec 2019; and&nbsp;</p><p>•<span style="white-space:pre">	</span>CR3 of the Core Strategy;&nbsp;</p><p>•<span style="white-space:pre">	</span>Policies BR15 of Borough wide Development Plan Document</p><p>•<span style="white-space:pre">	</span>SP4, SP6, DM29 of the Barking and Dagenham Draft Local Plan November 2019</p><div><br></div>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-36.0pt"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:107%;mso-bidi-font-family:
Calibri;mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-latin">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style="text-indent: -36pt; font-size: 13.3333px;">The proposed development by reason of the proposed single storey rear extension and the extraction system’s discordant design, excessive massing and prominent location would fail to respect the character and appearance of the existing building and the rest of the terrace as a whole, resulting in unsympathetic addition which is visually incongruous to the established local character. The proposed development would therefore be contrary to:&nbsp;<br></span><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;">• The National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (MHCLG, February 2019);&nbsp;</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-36.0pt"><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;"><br></span><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;">• </span><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;">Policies 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5 and 7.6 of the London Plan: Spatial Development Strategy for Greater London (GLA, consolidated with alterations since 2011, published March 2016);&nbsp;</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-36.0pt"><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;"><br></span><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;">• </span><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;">Policies D1, D2 and D4 of the Draft London Plan - intend to publish version Dec 2019; and</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-36.0pt"><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;"><br></span><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;">• </span><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;">Policy BC8 Mixed Use Development &amp; BP11 Urban Design of Borough Wide Development Policies (DPD) (2010),</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-36.0pt"><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;"><br></span><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;">• </span><span style="font-size: 13.3333px; text-indent: -36pt;">SP1, SP3 and DM8, DM11 of the Barking and Dagenham Draft Local Plan November 2019.</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-36.0pt"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:107%;mso-bidi-font-family:

description: Change of use from A1 to A3/A5 (pizza takeaway with eat in facilities) and an Erection of a 15m x 3.5m single storey rear extension for use as a storage room
